markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Arise, ye Worthy!](/Feats.aspx?ID=7215) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Nephilim" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=518" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [War of Immortals](/Sources.aspx?ID=232) pg. 55

**Prerequisites**
[Battleblooded](/Feats.aspx?ID=7196)

</column>

---

A touch of valkyrie magic in your blood lets you hold back death’s grasp. You can cast [_breath of life_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1456) as a divine innate spell once per day.
name: Arise, ye Worthy!
